short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-based text correction and input assistance extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your writing experience with our Chrome extension, designed to provide AI-powered text correction and input assistance at your fingertips. Simply select text within any webpage, right-click to access the context menu, and let our tool analyze and suggest improvements for grammar, syntax, and style in real time. Whether you're drafting emails, composing social media posts, or working on documents online, our extension streamlines the editing process, ensuring your writing is polished and professional. Embrace the future of writing with this essential tool for students, professionals, and anyone looking to improve their written communication.
